title: So RIOT what is your plan to stop the 3-5 man gank bot and get the tower + FTG at 6-7 minutes in?
body:
Seriously, this is one of the more annoying additions to season 7. Bot tower is significantly weaker than the others, so poking down the tower before that large gank is easy and the damage done can be pretty significant too. So then the first team to gank and either cluster fuck the enemy bot lane or push them off of the tower will 100% always get that tower before anyone can even make it there to defend it. 

This somewhat goes with one of the "weaknesses" in the ADC role too. Losing bot tower that early means that you cant really push out too far of your just a free kill from another gank. The ADC with the extra gold now has a large advantage over you, especially if they got FBG at the exact same time. Most ADCs cant even safely farm under tower with that kind of a gold difference pre 10 minutes (even pre level 6 sometimes). It is too great of a snowball catalyst for the bot lane who gets that FTG. And since there are very little alternative builds for ADCs, they can't just go more defensive to survive. They have to continue their expensive AF, high damage build or risk never being able to do anything in trades/group fights due to their lack of high damage items and/or core items.


I would suggest that FTG is not earned until 10 minutes in. If you have taken a tower prior to 10 minutes in, then no FTG is earned that game for either side.

You know, after reading what people have said and having seen the data, I think I know what the problem is.

First tower doesn't change the odds of winning excessively, but it changes people's behaviors quite a bit and encourages frustrating game patterns. As a game company, Riot should probably address this. It wouldn't be the first time they addressed something for game health rather than mere balance, like Kalista/Azir/assassins and etc etc.

Honestly, the way I see it and this might be a controversial opinion because it's somewhat radical, I think tower gold in general should just be removed entirely. Gold income is important for securing leads and coming back, it's integral to the game itself, but towers should be treated as a reward in itself. Not every objective needs to have gold to incentive(?) players, winning the game should be incentive enough. If it were up to me, and if Riot isn't going to decrease damage, they should really turn turrets into a dangerous threat without a gold reward. Make having your towers up a huge defensive advantage, while losing them a consequence.

I think you need to consider correlation as opposed to causation. A team coordinated enough to send multiple people bot for a dive and first tower blood are more likely to win games because it showcases their ability to coordinate better than the team that doesn't respond directly. Prior to FTB, getting the first turret was less valuable; as a result, even more coordinated teams weren't necessarily prioritizing it over other objectives. Now, though, piling bot gives both that and also leaves a good opportunity to take dragon on the backside of it. It's one of the more obvious plays a team can make now, and more macro-minded players realize that and execute. It might be less that getting FTB is op and more that a team capable of coordinating well enough to get it has an inherent advantage over a team who can't.
